description: The contour lines of the map series 'Topography beach Flemish coast' were digitized by the Flanders Marine Institute, within the framework of the CREST-project . The maps were prepared by Eurosense Belfotop NV for Coastal Division and reflect the height model of the coastal zone of the Flemish coast, following coastal morphology for coastal defense and management of the coastal zone. For the height values, the reference plane Z was used.
name: Contour lines (zone 17-18, Mariakerke, 1983-1996)
